name: Calcola Gauss + Istogramma
Raw Data 2h
query:
SELECT
    TRY_CAST(
        REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(SingleAvgFeature2,'$',''),'#',''),',','.')
    AS FLOAT) * 2 AS ValoreDiametro
FROM DataAnalysis
WHERE ReceiptName = '{{{global.ricetta}}}'
  AND DateTime >= DATEADD(HOUR, -2, GETDATE())
  AND TRY_CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(SingleAvgFeature2,'$',''),'#',''),',','.') AS FLOAT) > 0
ORDER BY DateTime ASC;

name: function 1
function 2

query:
SELECT  
    CAST(DateTime AS DATE) AS Giorno,
    ReceiptName AS Ricetta,

    SUM(TRY_CAST(GoodProduct AS FLOAT)) AS Buoni,
    SUM(TRY_CAST(BadProduct AS FLOAT)) AS Scarti,

    (SUM(TRY_CAST(BadProduct AS FLOAT)) * 100.0) /
    NULLIF(SUM(TRY_CAST(GoodProduct AS FLOAT)) + SUM(TRY_CAST(BadProduct AS FLOAT)), 0)
        AS Percentuale_Scarto,

    AVG(
        TRY_CAST(
            REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(SingleAvgFeature2,'$',''),'#',''),',','.') 
        AS FLOAT)
    ) * 2 AS Diametro_Medio

FROM DataAnalysis
WHERE DateTime >= DATEADD(day, -10, GETDATE())
GROUP BY CAST(DateTime AS DATE), ReceiptName
ORDER BY Giorno DESC, Ricetta ASC;

SELECT
    SUM(TRY_CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(WasteFeature0,'$',''),'#',''),',','.') AS FLOAT)) AS Area,
    SUM(TRY_CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(WasteFeature2,'$',''),'#',''),',','.') AS FLOAT)) AS Raggio,
    SUM(TRY_CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(WasteFeature3,'$',''),'#',''),',','.') AS FLOAT)) AS Rotondita,
    SUM(TRY_CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(WasteFeature14,'$',''),'#',''),',','.') AS FLOAT)) AS Buchi
FROM DataAnalysis
WHERE ReceiptName = '{{{global.ricetta}}}'
  AND DateTime >= DATEADD(DAY, -30, GETDATE());
